translations: n．真实性，准确性：指事实、陈述或信仰的真实性或准确性。
· The veracities of his statements were questioned by the investigators.
调查人员对他陈述的真实性提出了质疑。

sentences.sentence: Objective To discuss the essence of non?ossifying fibroma so as to increase the veracities of clinical diagnosis and treatment among the young.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨非骨化性纤维瘤的本质，提高非骨化性纤维瘤的临床诊治准确率。
